attributes.action: consider that as there is no longer any intention to levy tax on airline fuel that VW camper owners, other camper owners and even those who tow caravans or have tents should not have to pay tax on their fuel while on holiday.  Indeed as they contribute to the local domestic economy while on holiday fuel for holiday purposes should be subsidised by central government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It doesn't seem wise that we give holiday makers leaving the country to spend abroad and making no contribution to the economy of this country a tax break on their transport costs while still penalising those of us stupid enough to think that you can have a decent holiday in the UK.
